CRW3053 - Theory & Practice of Creative.name: CRW3053 - Theory & Practice of Creative Writing

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and a grade of "C" (2.0) or better in ENC 1102, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examination of the genres and readings in contemporary creative writing with attention to literary technique, and discussion of issues in the field.

CRW3311 - Readings in Poetry for Creativ.name: CRW3311 - Readings in Poetry for Creative Writing

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English  major  or  minor, and  grade  of  C  (2.0)  or  better in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive study of the structural characteristics of English, poetry, metrical systems, rhyme, scansion, and poetic rhetorical devices.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English  major  or  minor, and  grade  of  C  (2.0)  or  better in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An intermediate level fiction writing workshop for English majors; group analysis and criticism; close reading of contemporary fiction and fiction theory.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Consent of Honors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and techniques of literary genres with honors level content; practice and critique of original writing by peers and critical reading of established authors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic theories and practices associated with game design. Students learn effective writing techniques for developing original video games.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of C (2.0) or better required in ENC 1102.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Only open to non-majors. The techniques of literary genres; the practice and critique of original work by peers; critical reading of established authors. Designed for non-majors. Not open to students with credit in CRW 3013.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English  major  or  minor, and  grade  of  C  (2.0)  or  better in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An intermediate level poetry workshop for English majors. Group analysis and criticism; close reading of contemporary poetry and poetic theory.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English  major  or  minor, and  grade  of  C  (2.0)  or  better in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Writers present original nonfiction writing for class response and individual conferences. Reading of key works of creative nonfiction with discussion of definitions of the genre.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and practice of writing scripts for film and TV.

CRW3013 - Creative Writing for English M.name: CRW3013 - Creative Writing for English Majors

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in ENC 1102, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Literary genres; practice and critique of peer writing; critical reading of established authors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examination of fiction and poetry trends in current literary magazines, identifying editorial policies in publication of contemporary literature.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3120, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive writing practice in fiction. Peer critique and group discussion of original manuscripts.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3120, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of science fiction literature and writing of original science fiction stories. Workshop format with critique of writing assignments.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3610, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive practice in writing scripts. Peer critique and group discussion of original manuscripts.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3310, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive writing practice in poetry. Peer critique and group discussion of original manuscripts.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: PR: Grade of C (2.0) or better in CRW 3120 or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and practice of fantasy writing, with particular emphasis on techniques of worldbuilding

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013, CRW 3053 and at least one of CRW 3120, CRW 3211, CRW 3310, or CRW 3610 or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Overview of editing processes, the history and future of editing, issues and areas of literary and trade book publishing, and style through grammar and syntax.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3211, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intensive reading, writing, and workshop of creative nonfiction drawing on memory, observation, journalistic research, and literary techniques.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor and grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013 and CRW 3053, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Close study of style and craft in exemplary works of fiction and creative nonfiction from various time periods.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Responsibility for all aspects of editing The Cypress Dome-UCF's student literary journal.

CRW4804 - Creative Writing in the Commun.name: CRW4804 - Creative Writing in the Community

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, and grade of C (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013, CRW 3053 and at least one of CRW 3120, CRW 3211, CRW 3310, or CRW 3610 or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Teaching creative writing to community groups through service-learning.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: English major or minor, junior standing, and a grade of "C" (2.0) or better required in CRW 3013, CRW 3053, and C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Hands-on experience with all aspects of Florida Review publishing, editing, and production in conjunction with this national journal.
